title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant – Calls, Leads & Scheduling (Philippines Only)
job_overview:
Kubentro Cleaning Services is a fast-growing cleaning company based in New York City. We’re hiring a Virtual Assistant from the Philippines to help with:

– Calling and texting new client leads from platforms like Bark
– Asking for service details (type of apartment, extras like fridge/oven)
– Quoting cleaning prices based on a simple price sheet
– Booking appointments and confirming job info with subcontractor cleaners
– Calling restaurants to offer deep cleaning before inspections or court hearings
– Tracking leads and job updates in Google Sheets

You must be polite, fluent in English, organized, and responsive.

To apply, send a short voice message introducing yourself  to: +1 (917)Upgrade to see actual infoor email to Upgrade to see actual info
Note:This Position requires a minimum of 2 years of proven cold calling and lead follow-up experience.
The pay is $3 per hour(Php 20,000-25,000 monthly) for a 4-hour daily shift,Monday to Friday.
Please do not apply if you don't have strong outbound calling experience.
